name: Story of the Green Dragon - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This music DLC contains 22 soundtracks from Story of the Green Dragon -game!

1. Last Ninja (length 5 min 23 seconds, .ogg)
2. The Frontier of Kung-Fu (length 2 min 54 seconds, wav)
3. Rising Sun (length 3 min 32 seconds, .ogg)
4. Last Fight Mix2 (length 2 min 59 seconds, .wav)
5. Last Fight (length 3 min 05 seconds, .wav)
6. Green Dragon (length 3 min 35 seconds, .wav)
7. The Dragon (length 3 min 07 seconds, .wav)
8. Dragon's (length 2 min 51 seconds, .wav)
9. Just this (length 4 min 01 seconds, .wav)
10. Sun is Rising intro (length 1 min 05 seconds, .wav)
11. Sun goes down (length 2 min 34 seconds, .wav)
12. This Belong to Me (length 1 min 56 seconds, .wav)
13. Peaceful Morning (length 1 min 36 seconds, .wav)
14. Streets of Japan (length 4 min 25 seconds, .wav)
15. Hong Kong Forrest (length 3 min 38 seconds, .wav)
16. Space is Dark (length 2 min 34 seconds, .wav)
17. Hong Kong fever drum & bass (length 0 min, 46 seconds .wav)
18. Big city 1 (length 2 min, 49 seconds .wav)
19. Fight against Dragon (length 3 min, 41 seconds .wav)
20. It's in the dark (length 2 min, 38 seconds .wav)
21. Last standing (length 0 min, 46 seconds .wav)
22. Fighting Arena (length 1 min, 12 seconds, mp3)

After purchasing this DLC, you can access these files directly from Story of the Green Dragon launcher or from your files root (for example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ and seek Story of the Green Dragon -folder.

Please info us if you face any problem of finding Story of the Green Dragon -folder.
Please notice that some of soundtrack which you have heard in the game are not included to this DLC. This is because we do not have licence to sell some specific tracks. DLC also contain tracks which have not yet been added to the game but will be added on the next updates.
